name: Nancy Drew: Help Us Keep Inspiring Girls Through Games!
blurb: Her Interactive created the #1 PC adventure franchise \u2013 Nancy Drew.* Let\u2019s take the award winning series to smart phones and tablets!

rewards.reward: A big shout out from one of our YouTube "Thank You" videos!

A copy of the mobile game and an exclusive Nancy Drew: Tomb of the Lost Queen wallpaper for your mobile device or tablet.  Plus your name on the Her Interactive web site as an official Kickstarter backer.

Previous rewards plus access to the Producer\u2019s personal development forum/blog, your name listed as a super supporter on the Her Interactive website and 25% off any digital Nancy Drew game (PC/MAC) at herinteractive.com.
Previous rewards plus two Koko Kringle bars and the PC/MAC version of Nancy Drew: Tomb of the Lost Queen. (Please add an additional $10 to your pledge for international shipping.)
Previous rewards plus an exclusive Nancy Drew: Tomb of the Lost Queen t-shirt.  The back of the t-shirt will proudly display that you backed this project.

Previous rewards plus participation in the beta program for the game, an official Nancy Drew KICKSTARTER project poster signed by all employees of the company and an official Nancy Drew: Tomb of the Lost Queen iPhone cover. Plus a unique Nancy Drew ringtone by Lani Minella (the voice of Nancy Drew) for your cell phone and listed in the credits of Tomb of the Lost Queen.

Previous rewards plus an official Nancy Drew magnifying glass, any one item from the Her Interactive Merchandise Store and we will put a picture of you in the mobile version of Nancy Drew: Tomb of the Lost Queen.

Previous rewards plus a personalized avatar created by our in-house design team. Pledge level also includes soundtrack from game and signed CD by composer. Finally, you will also receive a one-of-a-kind Nancy Drew leather bound journal with never seen before concept sketches from prior Nancy Drew games and a leather Nancy Drew Card Holder.

Previous rewards plus a 2-hour consultation with the Development Team to help create and refine this new Nancy Drew mobile game that ensures designer consultant credit.  Pledge level also includes a 10 minute phone call with the voice of Nancy Drew -Lani Minella! Plus any one (1) item from the official Nancy Drew Merchandise Store.

Previous rewards plus a one-hour consultation and coaching session with Lani Minella on breaking into and how to be successful in doing Voice Over work in the Video Game Industry. You will also receive an exclusive, one-of-a-kind, official Nancy Drew Detective Set that will have you sleuthing for the rest of your life.

Previous rewards plus spend the day at the Her Interactive Headquarters in Bellevue, WA.  Have lunch with the development team and dinner with the executive team including Stuart Moulder, CEO and Megan Gaiser, CCSO.  This is your opportunity to ask us anything and have an immediate impact on the development of this mobile game! You\u2019ll also go home with a copy of every Nancy Drew adventure game that we have ever developed! Plus an exclusive Nancy Drew Taxi Wallet made exclusively for Her Interactive by Alicia Klein.

Previous rewards plus Stuart Moulder, CEO and Megan Gaiser, CCSO, will come to your home town and throw you an official Nancy Drew party for you and ten of your closest friends. Party includes food, drinks, prizes, games, fun and a whole lot more!
